FuncDef: This command specifies the range of IDs used by SR OS to automatically assign an ID to customers that are created in model-driven interfaces without an ID explicitly specified by the user or client.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the lower value of the ID range. The value must be less than or equal to the end value. Values-2 to 2147483647.
Specifies the upper value of the ID range. The value must be greater than or equal to the start value. Values-2 to 2147483647.
